solopt

PURPOSE

SOLOPT -- Creates a default options structure for BBNNLS

SYNOPSIS

function options = solopt(varargin)

DESCRIPTION 

 SOLOPT  --  Creates a default options structure for BBNNLS

 OPTIONS = SOLOPT
